thread.section_title: Archive News & Video for Wednesday, 21 Feb 2018 | Reuters.com
thread.title: BRIEF-UK's ‍CMA Says Found That Mole Valley's Purchase Of Retail Arm Of Countrywide Farmers Could Push Up Prices Or Lower Quality In 45 Local Areas​

author: Reuters Editorial
title: BRIEF-UK's ‍CMA Says Found That Mole Valley's Purchase Of Retail Arm Of Countrywide Farmers Could Push Up Prices Or Lower Quality In 45 Local Areas​

organizations.name: cma says found that mole valley

text:
Feb 21 (Reuters) - UK‘S ‍CMA:
* FOUND THAT MOLE VALLEY‘S PURCHASE OF RETAIL ARM OF COUNTRYWIDE FARMERS COULD PUSH UP PRICES OR LOWER QUALITY IN 45 LOCAL AREAS​
* FOUND THAT COMPANIES’ RETAIL BUSINESSES COMPETE CLOSELY, RESULTING IN REDUCED COMPETITION FOR CUSTOMERS IN 25 OF 45 LOCAL AREAS AFTER MERGER​
* ‍MOLE VALLEY NOW HAS OPPORTUNITY TO OFFER WAYS TO ADDRESS THESE COMPETITION CONCERNS​
